text: The 2010 Superstars GTSprint Series season was the first year of the International GTSprint Series. The season began at Monza on 28 March and finished at Vallelunga on 10 October. Alessandro Bonetti and Maurizio Mediani won the championship, driving a Ferrari. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team ! Car ! No. ! Drivers ! Class !
